name: Oh! RATS!
description:
This game was made for the 4 Game Devs Jam Off the Same Art Kit Hosted organized by Miziziziz. All devs received the same art assets and had to make a game in 48 hours (not consecutive). 

Controls:

Keyboard
Move - Arrow Keys or WASD
Jump - X or Space
Dash - Z or L Shift

Gamepad (XBox) *note- all gamepads should work button references are to xbox
Move - Left Analog or Dpad
Jump - A
Dash - X

Go to Menu - Q (Progress will be saved as long as window is open)
Fullscreen - F
Respawn at Checkpoint - R

Check out the video: 

Credits:

Music made by Wolfgang: https://opengameart.org/users/wolfgang

SFX made by Kronbits: https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx
